channel.title: [PI] Smelting X amount and Buying X amount
channel.description:
Hey moparscape I was wondering if anyone knows how to make smelting, smelt x amount? Iv looked all through my code and i cant find anything :\ Iv even tryed searching google, these forums and all but nothing comes up :(
Im also wanting to know if anyone knows how to make Shop sell X amount so that players can buy stuff without having to stand there for ages clicking Buy 50 LOL
Any help would be appreciated :D

item.title: [PI] Smelting X amount and Buying X amount
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

Loveandpower:

Been a long time since I edited my smelting/smithing files I will take a look tonight and get back with you.

Ok thanks alot

item.title: [PI] Smelting X amount and Buying X amount
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

Iv looked up and down the smithing.java and cannot find anything to do with how many it smelts :S i do have though

			c.smeltAmount--;
			c.smeltTimer = 1;

Not sure if that does anything? :S

I also tryed ripping the smithing.java and smithinginterface.java from hybridpvp v2 and it still doesnt work :S:S and hyrbid pvp v2 Smiths every single ore into a bar … but the new one doesnt :S

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Smelting X amount and Buying X amount
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

I hate doing it client side cos that means if they want it they gotta download the new client… lol, You know how to solve my smithing problem? you seem to help me out alot

Also can you post the files i need to edit the buy x in? and what code i should search for, for both server and client sided? I know this is spoonfeeding me but i honestly have no clue and i find it easyer to learn if i know were to look i right mini tuts for myself

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Smelting X amount and Buying X amount
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

In reality a buy x would still have a limit( I think it was 10k could be wrong). Anyway, this is server and client side.

Client side is adding the buying x
server side making it work.(the easy part lol I just replaced my buy 10 with it)

Read full topic
